definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: Never waste too much time on some new words and single sentences.
sentences.chinese: 不要在單個詞或單句上浪費太多時間。

sentences.english: The simple sentence is a kernel and sophisticated phenomenon in language studies.
sentences.chinese: 簡單句是語言研究中一個核心而複雜的現象。

sentences.english: You can develop two or more simple sentences into one of the previously listed sentence structures.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把兩三個簡單句發展成前面提到的這幾種句型。

sentences.english: Simple sentence and complex sentence are two kinds of basically sentence pattern in modern Chinese .
sentences.chinese: 單句和複句是現代漢語中的兩種基本句型。

sentences.english: For instance, you may write a few simple sentences interspersed with some compound sentences.
sentences.chinese: 例如，你可能會將一些簡單句和複合句結合起來使用。

sentences.english: Each simple sentence has only one verb.
sentences.chinese: 每一個簡單句內只有一個動詞。

sentences.english: Ask individual students to read a sentence each.
sentences.chinese: 讓學生個別操練單句朗讀。

sentences.english: But their complex sentences, although develop simultaneously with their simple sentences, occur somewhat later than their complete simple sentences do.
sentences.chinese: 複合句的出現稍遲於完整單句，和單句同時向前發展。

sentences.english: But their complex sentences, although develop simultaneously with their simple sentences, occur somewhat later than their complete simple sentences do.
sentences.chinese: 複合句的出現稍遲於完整單句，和單句同時向前發展。

sentences.english: A simple sentence has only one verb.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單句只有一個動詞。

sentences.english: English interrogative sentence is one of the four basic simple sentence patterns.
sentences.chinese: 英語疑問句是英語簡單句中四種基本句子類型之一。

sentences.english: Directions: In this part you will hear five sentences.
sentences.chinese: 在本部分中，你將聽到五個單句。

sentences.english: Write simple sentences. Avoid a fancy style.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試簡單句，避免花俏的句法。

sentences.english: It's easier to translate a sentence than a passage.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯段落要比翻譯單句難得多。
